snippet: Negotiations with the West over Iran’s nuclear program will resume this week in Turkey, Iranian news media reported Sunday, after a diplomatic back-and-forth over the venue.
abstract: Negotiations over Iran’s nuclear standoff with the West will resume in Turkey, after a diplomatic back-and-forth over the venue.
lead_paragraph: Negotiations with the West over Iran’s nuclear program will resume this week in Turkey, Iranian news media reported Sunday, after a diplomatic back-and-forth over the venue.

headline.seo: Iran Agrees to Nuclear Talks in Turkey, Reports Say
headline.main: Iran Agrees to Talks in Turkey, Ending Weeks of Friction Over the Site
headline.print_headline: Iran Agrees to Talks in Turkey, Ending Weeks of Friction Over the Site
